DOC.brief_summary: Use long act reversible contraception ( LARC ) implant intrauterine contraception ( IUC ) show reduce repeat abortion . LARCs advantage independent user error consider underused , especially among young individual oral method high rate user failure . IUC often underused young nulliparous woman due fear pain insertion . 10 ml mepivacaine ( 10mg/ml ) 10ml sodium hydrochloride inject uterine cavity hydrosonography catheter tenaculum apply prior sound insertion IUC . The investigator ' hypothesis instillation 10 ml ( 10mg/ml ) mepivacaine though hydrosonography catheter prior instrument placement provide effective pain relief instillation 10 ml placebo ( sodium chloride 9mg/ml ) . Primary objective : To evaluate difference pain score time insertion IUC treatment control group . Secondary objective : To evaluate acceptability procedure .
